sub_title: Equity, Diversity & Inclusion | Personal Leadership Coach | Certified Human Resources Professional | Certified Internal Auditor | Board Member | Investor  #inclusion, #invisible diseases #womenofcolor and #leadership
summary:
With over 20 years' experience, I advise, coach and guide on human resources and equity, diversity & inclusion initiatives in Canada and beyond. I'm an entrepreneurial senior executive and advocate for women's rights and equality, with a specialized focus on women with culturally diverse backgrounds in leadership

I'm also the Founder Veza, an equity, diversity and inclusion firm with a special focus on the elevation to equality at decision making tables of people of culturally diverse backgrounds.

AREAS OF EXPERTISE:
» Equity, Diversity and Inclusion assessments, audits and advisory 
» Inclusive Leadership Coaching and training
» Organizational Culture
» Organizational Development 
» Process Redesign & Development 
» Change Management
» Strategic Planning & Partnerships
» Business Development
» Stakeholder Relations

I'm dedicated to creating strong organizational cultures and creating a better world through economic empowerment of marginalized and racialized groups through training, international leadership retreats and coaching programs.

Listed at number 15 globally on EMpower 100 Ethnic Minority Future Leaders List 2020
Advisor for Surrey Art Gallery Exhibit: Many Visions, Many Versions: Art from Indigenous Communities in India 
Curatorial Advisor: Museum of Vancouver Bhangra.Me Exhibit

profile_positions.description:
Veza is an equity, diversity and inclusion consulting firm with an organizational assessment tool to measure how well the organization is doing on their EDI maturity journey. We work with organizations to embed EDI in how they operate in Human Resources, marketing, supplier diversity and inclusive product development. I am a leadership coach for women of color. 

Countries worked in: Canada, US, Netherlands, Croatia, India, Serbia, Kosovo

CONTRIBUTIONS:
» Created and led the development of a proprietary equity and diversity measurement and assessment tool that is industry agnostic and specifies impactful action steps towards a diverse and inclusive workforce
» Identified competitively advantageous opportunity/foothold for Canadian businesses and led a trade mission of women entrepreneurs to Croatia—one of the first in Canada by a privately-owned entity
» Also served as a strategic advisor for community engagement strategies at the local, provincial and federal levels

ALSO:
» Perform HR audits for multiple companies in the tech sector and develop hiring plans, onboarding programs and create an inclusive culture strategy for underrepresented groups
» Restructure procedures by coordinating with CEO/COO of various companies to create and execute people-focused HR projects 
» Create and facilitate workshops for organizational managers on topics of gender equality, unconscious bias, leadership development and cross-cultural teams
» Coach executives of multi-million-dollar companies to business leaders, small-business owners, on how to manage career development, team management, leadership with a diversity and inclusion lens
» Development of a skilled immigrant career development program projected to impact 200,000 immigrants over a 3-year period

profile_positions.title: Senior Advisor, Diversity and Inclusion

profile_positions.description:
With over 15 years of Personal and Executive Coaching and having coached for over 10,000 hours, working with women of color to further own their personal leadership journey whether in the corporate environment or as an entrepreneur has been a delight. 

Having witnessed transformations of creating new family dynamics, utilizing cultural programming to benefit the individual and witnessing these women feeling empowered and engaged with their life in a new way, all with the use of spiritual, intuitive, emotional intelligence tools and positive psychology approaches, is the core of the why this coaching is important to me. 

Join our regular community calls, participate in the group program or engage in the one to one coaching options. More info available at 
http://Ishvarawellness.com

volunteer_experiences.description: Canada India Education Society (CIES) uses its resources to support vital projects relating to education, community development, health care, and job creation in India. CIES facilitates international cooperation and collaboration through the promotion of civil society partnerships between Canada and India with a specialized focus on fostering relationships between groups in British Columbia and those in Punjab.
Promoting health by providing individuals with substance and alcohol addiction issues with access to counselling, information, treatment, aftercare and/ or group support programs.

company.name: Be Your Own Best Friend South Asian Women's Network

volunteer_experiences.description:
Be Your Own Best Friend (BYOBF) is a South Asian women's networking group geared towards all women from SAHMs, home-based business owners and entrepreneurs to office workers, and those exploring new opportunities.

(Grown to become the premier networking group for South Asian Professional Women, Be Your Own Best Friend (“BYOBF”) provides a platform for continued development of growth and potential.)

www.byobfnetwork.ca

CONTRIBUTIONS:
Developed vision to achieve required mandate of providing leadership and professional development opportunities in a supportive environment, responsible for establishing and implementing key strategies, including: business development, marketing, partnerships, recruitment, revenue strategy and growth. Bolstered membership growth to 500, representing success of overall initiative and marketing strategy to the targeted demographic.

ALSO:
» Strategically created and developed detailed business plan, including establishing a system to measure that objectives were met
» Collaborated with team to develop BYOBF’s identity and scope of organization, including access for women to gain skills, knowledge and empowerment in their chosen field 
» Identified and successfully engaged key community stakeholders, and developed opportunities for networking, social events, clinics, seminars, an online community and other key programs

Tka's Eternal Life Society was founded in celebration of my brother Taranveer Dhillon's life.

CONTRIBUTIONS:
» Fundraising for kids in sports vai the Annual Ball Hockey tournament
» Raising awareness about, and supporting men's emotional/mental health

CONTRIBUTIONS:
